meanings: ('주다'의 높임말) give[offer] (sb sth / sth to sb)

vlive.korean: 드립니다. I'll ask it now. 듣기 View video NCT의 night night! : SBS 파워FM with NCT DREAM
그걸 제발 좀 지켜주세요 부탁드립니다 알겠죠? Please keep that promise. I ask you. Okay? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 용콩별콩 뒤집어지는 LIVE
vlive.english: Please keep that promise. I ask you. Okay?

vlive.korean: 베트남 V HEARTBEAT 2주년을 진심으로 축하드립니다! Congratulations to Vietnam V HEARTBEAT's 2nd anniversary! 듣기 View video V HEARTBEAT VIETNAM : THE BOYZ Chúc mừng kỉ niệm 2 năm V HEARTBEAT
vlive.english: Congratulations to Vietnam V HEARTBEAT's 2nd anniversary!

vlive.korean: 잘 부탁드립니다~ Please take good care of me. 듣기 View video WayV (威神V) : hihi~
vlive.english: Please take good care of me.

vlive.korean: 나는 윈윈입니다 잘 부탁드립니다~ I'm WinWin. Please take good care of me. 듣기 View video WayV (威神V) : hihi~
vlive.english: I'm WinWin. Please take good care of me.

examples.korean: We need your help—please give generously. 발음듣기 저희는 당신의 도움이 필요합니다. 후한 기부를 부탁드립니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We need your help—please give generously. 발음

examples.korean: We apologize unreservedly for any offence we have caused. 발음듣기 저희가 조금이라도 기분 상하게 해 드렸다면 전적으로 사과 드립니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We apologize unreservedly for any offence we have caused. 발음

examples.korean: This discount voucher entitles you to 10% off your next purchase. 발음듣기 이 할인권은 다음 구매 때 10%의 할인 자격을 드립니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This discount voucher entitles you to 10% off your next purchase. 발음

examples.korean: I’d advise extreme caution. 발음듣기 극도로 조심하시기를 충고 드립니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
I beg you to have pity on him. 발음듣기 그를 불쌍히 여겨 주시기를 간청 드립니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I beg you to have pity on him. 발음
